answer:
ImmunizeBC only answers questions about immunization.
Get detailed information about health services in BC at HealthLinkBC by dialing 8-1-1 anytime.
Immunization Nurse
question: My brother-in-law, has to get transportation for Specialist Doctors and treatment at hospital. Is there any Club or facility that could help with this. He sometimes has to wait a few hours in hospital after treatment. It is hard to arrange times/schedules within family.
